name: Magical Queen's Land
description: ✭ WISHLIST NOW! ✭ Welcome to Magical Queen's Land, an amusement park in it's great opening week, looking for new personnel for the park maintenance in the night with a new organization. The Magical Queen''s Land Partner program, where prisoners use part time work to reduce their sentence penalty, we are one of them.. ¿Ready to work at the most haunted amusement park? #horror #survival-horror #simulator
